name: PKSuicaPassProperties
desc: The properties of a pass used as a ticket for the Suica transportation system.

items.name: init?(for: PKPass)
items.desc: Instantiates a Suica pass properties object that contains the properties supported in the specified pass.

items.name: var isBlocked: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the pass issuer disabled the pass.

items.name: var isBlacklisted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the transit pass issuer disabled the pass.

items.name: var isGreenCarTicketUsed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the customer has redeemed the Green Car ticket.

items.name: var isInShinkansenStation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the pass has tapped in at a Shinkansen Station and has not tapped out.

items.name: var isInStation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the transit pass has tapped in at a station and has not tapped out.

items.name: var transitBalance: NSDecimalNumber
items.desc: The current usable stored value on the transit card.

items.name: var transitBalanceCurrencyCode: String
items.desc: The currency code associated with the balance on the pass.

items.name: var isBalanceAllowedForCommute: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates how the balance can be used.

items.name: var isLowBalanceGateNotificationEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the terminal provides feedback if the balance is low after a deduction.
